pli-tv-pvr2.5:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for a lustful nun consenting to a lustful man making physical contact with her, through how many of the six kinds of originations of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr2.5:1.3: from body and mind, not from speech. …
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.1: When it comes to the offenses for asking for curd and then eating it, through how many of the six kinds of originations of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.3: from body, not from speech or mind; or
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.4: from body and speech, not from mind; or
pli-tv-pvr2.5:2.5: from body and mind, not from speech; or
pli-tv-pvr2.5:3.1: The fifth section on originations is finished.
